caption.center: PEOPLE v. JOSE TORRES A/K/A MICHAEL PEREZ

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.panel: Before: Williams, J.P., Tom, Mazzarelli, Lerner, Saxe, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Time to perfect appeal from judgment rendered on or about October 6, 1998 enlarged to the January 2002 Term.
